panels.title: sidekiq Service Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="sidekiq"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_5m{type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_1h{type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_30m{type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_service_apdex:ratio_6h{type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: shard_database_throttled SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_database_throttled",type="sidekiq"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="shard_database_throttled",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_database_throttled",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_database_throttled",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_database_throttled",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="shard_database_throttled",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_database_throttled",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_6h{component="shard_database_throttled",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_database_throttled",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: shard_database_throttled SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:
### Description

Aggregation of all jobs for the database-throttled Sidekiq shard.



### Observability Tools

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: shard_imports SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_imports",type="sidekiq"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="shard_imports",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_imports",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_imports",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_imports",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="shard_imports",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_imports",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_6h{component="shard_imports",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_imports",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.
panels.title: shard_imports SLI RPS - Requests per Second

panels.content:

Aggregation of all jobs for the imports Sidekiq shard.

panels.title: shard_quarantine SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_quarantine",type="sidekiq"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="shard_quarantine",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_quarantine",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or

    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_quarantine",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_quarantine",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="shard_quarantine",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_quarantine",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or

    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

### Description

Aggregation of all jobs for the urgent-cpu-bound Sidekiq shard.



### Observability Tools

panels.title: Details

panels.description: Apdex is a measure of requests that complete within a tolerable period of time for the service. Higher is better.

seriesOverrides.alias: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

targets.legendFormat: 6h Degradation SLO (5% of monthly error budget)
1h Outage SLO (2% of monthly error budget)

panels.title: shard_urgent_other SLI Apdex

targets.expr:
sum(
  label_replace(
    vector(0) and on() (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"}),
    "period", "na", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(1) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_5m{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(2) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_1h{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (14.4 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_30m{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "30m", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(8) and on () (gitlab_component_apdex:ratio_6h{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} < on(tier, type) group_left() (1 - (6 * (1 - slo:min:events:gitlab_service_apdex:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})))),
    "period", "6h", "", ""
  )
)

    "period", "5m", "", ""
  )
  or

    vector(2) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_1h{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (14.4 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})),
    "period", "1h", "", ""
  )
  or
  label_replace(
    vector(4) and on() (gitlab_component_errors:ratio_30m{component="shard_urgent_other",type="sidekiq"} > on(tier, type) group_left() (6 * slo:max:events:gitlab_service_errors:ratio{component="shard_urgent_other",monitor="global",type="sidekiq"})),
    "period", "30m", "", ""

    "period", "6h", "", ""

)

panels.description: The operation rate is the sum total of all requests being handle for all components within this service. Note that a single user request can lead to requests to multiple components. Higher is busier.

panels.content:

Aggregation of all jobs for the urgent-other Sidekiq shard.
